title: Generate sitemap.xml for sangharshclasses.in (frontend-only, no other changes)

requirements.summary: Generate/overwrite a valid XML sitemap.xml using absolute URLs for only existing frontend routes.
acceptanceCriteria: The file is valid XML and conforms to the sitemap protocol (<urlset xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9"> ... )
All <loc> values use absolute URLs starting with https://sangharshclasses.in
The sitemap includes only existing frontend page URLs (no invented routes and no # fragments)

file_operations.description: Overwrite sitemap.xml to include ONLY the existing frontend route(s) detected from the current app (currently the SPA Home route at https://sangharshclasses.in/), using sitemap protocol XML with absolute <loc> URLs rooted at https://sangharshclasses.in and no URL fragments.

requirements.summary: Ensure no repository changes occur except the sitemap.xml update.
acceptanceCriteria: The only repository file change is to sitemap.xml (no other files added, removed, or modified)

file_operations.description: Limit all work strictly to frontend/public/sitemap.xml; do not edit, add, delete, or rename any other files (including robots.txt, redirects, HTML, CSS, and source code).

requirements.summary: Provide the public sitemap URL after generation.

file_operations.description: Finalize the sitemap.xml update so the public URL can be shared exactly as https://sangharshclasses.in/sitemap.xml.
